## TextChange interface

`TextChange` is the value passed as an argument to `Document.subscribe()`<!-- -->. `Document.subscribe()` is called when the `Text` is modified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface TextChange<A = Indexable> extends ValueChange<TextValueType<A>> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ValueChange](./yorkie-js-sdk.valuechange.md)<!-- -->&lt;TextValueType&lt;A&gt;&gt;
